about_the_game:
Embark on a spine-chilling adventure in "Malice," a bone-rattling horror game that will test your courage and wits. Step into the shoes of a fearless paranormal investigator tasked with uncovering haunted objects and purging them of their malevolent spirits.

Explore the eerie environments of either a sinister mansion shrouded in a dark history of ghostly manifestations.

Burn the haunted objects you find and you will succeed in cleansing the haunted locations of their unholy presence.

Prepare for heart-pounding encounters and a hauntingly atmospheric experience, crafted to keep you on the edge of your seat. As you progress.

Whether you choose to brave this chilling journey alone or team up with two friends for an unforgettable multiplayer co-op experience, "Malice" promises an unforgettable paranormal adventure that will leave you questioning what lies beyond the veil of our reality.

Will you have the courage to confront the malevolent spirits and free these locations from their torment? Will you be able to resist the call of darkness that surrounds these haunted objects? Only the bravest and most determined players will survive the terrors of "Malice." Dare to step into the unknown and uncover the truth behind the curse in this bone-chilling horror game.

content_descriptors.notes: The following contains some blood, gore and jumpscares

  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
